ingredients.ingredient: 1 (4 ounce) package Idahoan® Four Cheese Mashed Potatoes

cookingTips: Prepare instant mashed potatoes according to package directions and let cool slightly before filling
Wrap each stuffed jalapeno with two bacon slices, crisscrossing for secure cooking
Bake at 400°F for 20-25 minutes until bacon is crispy and jalapenos are tender
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Should the bacon be pre-cooked or cooked together with the jalapenos, and why?
